feed.title: Google Cloud: Assured Open Source Software
feed.subtitle: Changelog for Google Cloud product: Assured Open Source Software

entry.content: Assured Open Source Software (Assured OSS) now supports Go packages. For more information, see Download Go packages using direct repository access for the free tier.
entry.summary: Assured Open Source Software (Assured OSS) now supports Go packages, allowing you to download them directly. This feature simplifies the process of managing and utilizing Go open source dependencies.
entry.title: Feature: Go Packages Now Supported by Assured OSS
